mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (product_name, product_price, product_description, product_image, product_category, product_size) VALUES (#{product_name}, #{product_price}, #{product_description}, #{product_image}, #{product_category}, #{product_size})
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET product_name = #{product_name}, product_price = #{product_price}, product_description = #{product_description}, product_image = #{product_image}, product_category = #{product_category}, product_size = #{product_size} WHERE product_reg_num = #{product_reg_num}
